mapper.select: SELECT `kapp`,`kano`,`katype`,`bzname`,`kalc`,`kaid` FROM kache k INNER JOIN banzu b WHERE k.`bzid`=b.`bzid`
SELECT `kapp`,`kano`,`katype`,`kalc`,`bzname`,`kaid`,k.`bzid`,k.`kastatus` FROM kache k INNER JOIN banzu b ON k.`bzid`=b.`bzid` WHERE k.`bzid`=b.`bzid` and k.`kastatus`=0

SELECT `kapp`,k.`kano`,`katype`,`kalc`,`bzname`,`kaid`,k.`bzid`,k.`kastatus`,w.`kano` FROM kache k INNER JOIN banzu b ON k.`bzid`=b.`bzid` INNER JOIN weixiurecord w ON k.`kano`=w.`kano` WHERE k.`bzid`=b.`bzid` AND k.`kastatus`=1 AND w.`status`=0

SELECT k.`kapp`,k.`kano`,k.`katype`,k.`kalc`,b.`bzname`,k.`kaid`,k.`bzid`,k.`kastatus` FROM kache k INNER JOIN banzu b ON k.`bzid`=b.`bzid` INNER JOIN weixiurecord w ON k.`kano`=w.`kano` WHERE k.`bzid`=b.`bzid` AND k.`kastatus`=1 AND w.`status`=1
mapper.update: update kache set kastatus = #{kastatus} where kaid = ${kaid}
